```{r setup-rmd, include=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(timci)
library(magrittr)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE,
                      warning = FALSE,
                      message = FALSE)
```

```{r}

path_dir <- params$path_dir

if (!is.null(params$facility_data)) {
  
  facility_data <- params$facility_data
  wfa_data <- params$wfa_data
  
}
```

```{r}
stats <- timci::get_summary_by_deviceid(facility_data)
stats <- merge(x = stats,
               y = params$research_facilities,
               by.x = 'device_id',
               by.y = 'deviceid',
               all.x = TRUE)

stats <- stats %>%
  dplyr::group_by(facility_id) %>%
  dplyr::summarise(recruitment_start = min(recruitment_start),
                   recruitment_last = max(recruitment_last),
                   screened = sum(screened),
                   children = sum(children),
                   female = sum(female),
                   yg_infant = sum(yg_infant),
                   yg_female = sum(yg_female))
stats <- merge(x = stats,
               y = params$research_facilities %>% select(facility_id, facility_name, lvl2),
               by.x = 'facility_id',
               by.y = 'facility_id',
               all = FALSE)
stats <- stats[!duplicated(stats$facility_id), ]
tmp <- timci::export_df2xlsx(stats,
                             path_dir,
                             paste0("facility_stats_", Sys.Date()))
```

```{r, results = "asis"}
if (!is.null(wfa_data)) {
  
  if (nrow(wfa_data) > 0) {
    
    tmp <- timci::export_df2xlsx(wfa_data,
                                 path_dir,
                                 paste0("weekly_facility_assessment_", Sys.Date()))
    
    last_data <- timci::extract_last_fa_data(wfa_data, stats)
    soc_data <- last_data[last_data$arm == 0,]
    pox_data <- last_data[last_data$arm == 1,]
    cdsa_data <- last_data[last_data$arm == 2,]
    
    if (nrow(pox_data) > 0) {
      cat("\\newpage")
      cat('# Facilities with pulse oximetry alone\n\n')
      display_weekly_fa_data_per_facility(pox_data,
                                          wfa_data)
    }
    if (nrow(cdsa_data) > 0) {
      cat("\\newpage")
      cat('# Facilities with pulse oximetry and CDSA\n\n')
      display_weekly_fa_data_per_facility(cdsa_data,
                                          wfa_data)
    }
    
    last_data2 <- timci::extract_last_fa_data(wfa_data,
                                              stats)
    out <- format_weekly_fa_data_for_export(last_data2)
    out <- out[out$facility_id %in% params$research_facilities$facility_id, ]
    tmp <- timci::export_df2xlsx(out,
                                 path_dir,
                                 paste0("TIMCI_M&E_RA_data_for_PATH_", Sys.Date()))
    
  }
  
}
```
